attributes.review: I downloaded the app only to give it one start cause trump is a walking garbage bin who only cares about cis straight white men. However shortly after downloading the app my phone completely crashed, my dog died, and my sisters were abducted. I hope this big gets fixed soon. it would be such a shame if this horrid app were to be removed from the app store 😉.
attributes.title: What even is this app?

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, it not only found my instagram and followed all of the kpop stars but it also made me recite the entire Bee Movie word for word. not mention that if you type a word incorrectly, multiple ads about strawberry lube pop up everywhere and flood your email. It frankly made me so disgusted that i threw up on my own mother. so no thank you🙄✌🏻not cool donald
attributes.title: this cheeto needs to be stopped

attributes.review: I can’t even put into words how bad this app is!! I will never be the same after what i saw when I opened this app, nearly naked pictures of our hot cheeto! All of my Trump 2020 merchandise went up in flames nearly burning my house down!! My Grandma is in the hospital because of this app!!! She might die!! I wish -10,000 stars was an option!! I’ve never hated an app more!! Do NOT download!! 🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIFYING!!

attributes.review: Wow, I’d love to say that I expected more from this app, but considering the name in the title, I did not expect more. It’s a truly disgusting app designed for only the most bigoted and racist folks. I don’t quite know why anybody in there right mind would consider using this terrible app. Oh wait, unfortunately most Trump supporters aren’t in their right mind! 🤦🏽‍♀️ If I could give this app zero stars, I would.
attributes.title: Truly Horrific App

attributes.review: i downloaded this app in the hopes of getting unbiased 🤪❌information on the possibility of american greatness 🇺🇸 but was sadly disappointed 😔👊🏽 and for some reason 🤷🏽‍♀️ right after downloading ‼️ something just didn’t 🚫sit right with my spirit 🙍🏽‍♀️🔮 i was shown visions of an orange 🍊 man with ghAstly features that would be a disgrace upon the devil 👿 himself 😳🤬 definitely do nOt recommend!!
attributes.title: disgusted 🤢 but not ❌ surprised 🤯

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all hype was about but when they asked if I was 17+ I knew something was up. I said what could go wrong 🤷‍♀️ so I download the app and my phone starts glitching and heating up and I couldn’t open the app again. I am so disappointed and disgusted Trump’s app would do this to me. I will not be trusting him or this app ever again. I would totally rate 0 stars if possible.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE

attributes.review: this app is awful. I downloaded it thinking it would be a meme and then I had to see a picture of DONALD TRUMP. that is disgusting. I am scared. I am also considering suing. I also read some stuff and it was FAKE NEWS. like bunker boy says don't believe fake news which is exactly why you shouldn't download this app. hated every minute off it. the Manny will not be televised. stan jenna marbles. xoxo
attributes.title: the Manny will not be televised

attributes.review: This app is shameful in every way possible. I download to the app, expecting to see my amazing, hardworking, president and right when i download it, my house gets robbed. Suddenly my dog dies and my 55 year old dad passes out. Next thing I know, there’s a tornado right above our house and we are forced to flee. We are now homeless because of Trump and his ridiculous campaign. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I HAVE CHANGED MY POLITICAL VIEWS SINCE THIS TRAGEDY: #SettleForBiden2020
attributes.title: Embarrassing 😹🙈✨

attributes.review:
Ok so I, a republican Christian mother of 69 children decided to support our amazing and totally not terrible president mr trump! 😍🥰⛪️✝️💖 but then a stinky little gen z kid popped out of the phone and kicked me in the no no square 😡😡 I was so mad that I cried and then the crazy kids next door ding dong ditched me!! What!!?!!? 😫😫 then I decided to go buy some fun tickets for the trump rally but they were all sold out 😨😨😨 this app is cursed!!! Do not buy it!!!!!!!!! 🤢🤢🤢😨🤤😴😨🤤😧😨😧😨😧😰
👁👄👁😾😾✨✨✨✨🦋🦋🦋💥🙄
attributes.title: Omg so bad I died 😾😾

attributes.review: I was signed up for an event and it didn’t even notify me! I was really looking forward to support my president but I guess won’t be able to now. Also as an older person, the app is a little hard to use. I can’t seem to get the hang of it. Don’t waste your time on this app. There are better ways to track what our awesome president is doing!
attributes.title: Such a Bad App
